about: Adroit Resources is a wholly-owned subsidiary of Nisum, a global technology consulting firm headquartered in Southern California. A preferred partner to leading Fortune 500 brands, Adroit Resources, Inc. is a certified, minority-owned, dynamic Information Technology services company.  Our offerings range from staff augmentation to technology consulting. Adroit Resources works on IT and Non-IT positions for emerging start-ups, mid-size, and Fortune 100 companies, nationwide. We staff in the Internet, Retail/eCommerce, Semiconductor, Healthcare, Media/Television/Streaming, Manufacturing, Storage, and Security space.
specialties: IT Solutions and Services, Permanent Recruitment, Temporary Recruitment, Contract Recruitment, VMS/MSP Programs, Contract to Hire Placements, Contingent Workforce Supplier, SOW, and Cloud, UI, Java, DevOps, Release, QE

recentReview.name: John Doe
recentReview.review: Great experience with Adroit Resources. Highly recommended!

recentReview.name: Jane Smith
recentReview.review: Adroit Resources delivered exceptional service. Will work with them again!
